attributes.action: American style policing is unacceptable in the UK
attributes.additional_details: We do not need to spend thousands of pounds employing an American Guro to advise the UK Police, whilst at the same time reducing the Policing budget. The issues are different and wide ranging. I believe we should support the UK police in their work. It is also massively insulting to the professionalism of our Police Force and the dangers which they face on a daily basis.
